attributes.action: reform council tax in order that the tax is related to household income and not house value
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
House value is no indication of ablity to pay tax. Take two houses of equal value, one has a house hold income of £10,000 and the other a household income of £30,000.

Is it fair that both should pay the same council tax?

I do not think so.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
